/* csInfoMapper.selectCsInfo */ SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum,csNo,csGrade,csId,csNm,csPhone,csEmail,csAddrOne,csAddrTwo,csBirthYear,csBirthMonth,createDate FROM (SELECT CS_NO AS csNo ,DECODE(CS_GRADE,'2','탈퇴','회원') AS csGrade ,CS_ID AS csId ,CS_NM AS csNm ,CS_PHONE AS csPhone ,CS_EMAIL AS csEmail ,CS_ADDR_ONE AS csAddrOne ,CS_ADDR_TWO AS csAddrTwo ,CS_BIRTH_YEAR AS csBirthYear ,CS_BIRTH_MONTH AS csBirthMonth ,CS_BIRTH_DAY AS csBirthDay ,CREATE_DATE AS createDate FROM CUSTOMER_INFO WHERE 1 = 1
AND CREATE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDt}) AND TO_DATE(#{endDt})+ 1
AND CS_GRADE IN ('0','1','2')
AND CS_GRADE IN ('0','1')
AND CS_GRADE = ('2')
AND(CS_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%' OR CS_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%')
AND(CS_ID LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%')
AND(CS_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchVal}||'%')
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC,CS_NO DESC )WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endCount} )WHERE rnum >= #{startCount}

/* csInfoMapper.selectDetailCsInfo */ SELECT CS_NO AS csNo ,DECODE(CS_GRADE,'2','탈퇴','회원') AS csGrade ,CS_ID AS csId ,CS_PS AS csPs ,CS_NM AS csNm ,CS_PHONE AS csPhone ,CS_EMAIL AS csEmail ,CS_ADDR_ONE AS csAddrOne ,CS_ADDR_TWO AS csAddrTwo ,CS_BIRTH_YEAR AS csBirthYear ,CS_BIRTH_MONTH AS csBirthMonth ,CS_BIRTH_DAY AS csBirthDay ,CREATE_DATE AS createDate FROM CUSTOMER_INFO WHERE CS_NO = #{csNo}

/* csInfoMapper.selectOrderHistory */ SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum,odNo,odState,gdNm,odDate,trDate FROM (SELECT a.odNo ,a.gdNm ,a.odState ,a.trDate ,b.odDate FROM(SELECT o.OD_NO AS odNo ,LISTAGG(g.GD_NM,',') AS gdNm ,DECODE(o.OD_STATE,'100','주문완료','200','주문취소','300','배송중','400','배송완료') AS odState ,to_char(t.TR_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')AS trDate FROM ORDER_INFO o LEFT OUTER JOIN GOODS_INFO g ON g.GD_NO = o.GD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TRANSFER_INFO t ON t.OD_NO = o.OD_NO WHERE o.CS_NO = #{selectOptValOne} GROUP BY o.OD_NO,o.OD_STATE,t.TR_DATE)a INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT to_char(o.OD_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')AS odDate,o.OD_NO as odNo FROM ORDER_INFO o LEFT OUTER JOIN GOODS_INFO g ON g.GD_NO = o.GD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TRANSFER_INFO t ON t.OD_NO = o.OD_NO WHERE o.CS_NO = #{selectOptValOne}) b ON b.odNo = a.odNo )WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endCount} )WHERE rnum >= #{startCount}
